name: Cosmo's Delivery and Logistics
description:
Ultra-long-haul space trucking doesn't normally provide much entertainment, but Cosmo has a nose for trouble – and a nose for poker games in particular. Luckily for him, the locals along Interstellar-81 are always up for a game. They just don't need to know about the ace up his sleeve...

CHEAT

  • Use your deck of cheat cards to change your hand, change the river, or even exchange hands with opponents
  • Build your deck of cheats with experience as you play
  • Test your cunning against local cheaters, like Frankie "The Ace" and "Short Line" Larry

EXPLORE

  • Travel to sunbaked planetoids and humid moons
  • See renowned local landmarks like the Black Hole Donut Shop or the Giant Tire Pile
  • Hunt down secrets in the hidden corners of Asteroid County

RAISE THE STAKES

  • Win at small-time tables to build your reputation and get access to higher-stakes games
  • Upgrade your truck to check out new pit-stops
  • Mosey on over to New Reno Station and compete in the 78th Annual Truck Pull and Poker Tournament against the most notorious cheaters in the county!
